extension.author: Ad3mix

field.name: catid
field.label: Select Category
field.description: Select the category of articles to display

field.name: ordering
field.label: Ordering
field.description: Order in which articles are displayed

field.name: columns
field.label: Number of Columns
field.description: Set the number of columns for the articles layout.

field.name: space
field.label: Space Between Items (px)
field.description: Set the space (in pixels) between articles.

field.name: image_width
field.label: Thumbnail Width (px)
field.description: Set the width of the thumbnail images.

field.name: image_height
field.label: Thumbnail Height (px)
field.description: Set the height of the thumbnail images.

field.name: show_intro
field.label: Show Intro Text
field.description: Show or hide the intro text

field.name: title_size
field.label: Title Font Size
field.description: Select the font size for the article title.

field.name: title_position
field.label: Title Position
field.description: Choose the position of the title relative to the image.

field.name: border
field.label: Article Border
field.description: Define the border style for each article (e.g., '1px solid #ddd').

field.name: padding
field.label: Article Padding (px)
field.description: Set the padding around the content inside each article.
